fry_jiko: A choleric girl who loves to imagine, light up your day with my caramel smile. Hello I'm FREYA!
profile_desc:
Raden Rara Freyanashifa Jayawardana or often called Freya is a 7th generation JKT48 member who was born in Tangerang on February 13 2006.

Freya was first introduced as a member of JKT48 at the "Everyday, Kachuusha/UZA" Handshake Festival which took place on September 29 2018.
know_freya_more: Get to Know Freya Better
follow_freya: Follow Daily Activity of Freya
follow_desc: Follow Freya & JKT48's social media accounts so you don't miss the latest updates on their activities.
footer_desc:
Freyanation ID or often called Freyanation/FN is the fanbase of Freya Jayawardana.
Founded on September 30th 2018, exactly one day after Freya was introduced as a member of JKT48.
page_not_found_desc:
The page you are looking for is not available or under construction.
Sorry for the inconvenience. We are committed to continuing to provide the most updated information from Freya.
